RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Nutrition efficiency
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks determine how efficient a predator's digestion and conversion are with prey, unconnected to any metabolism modifiers. The better the efficiency, the more vore product a predator produces.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Godlike Efficiency
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: Is it magic? Archotech implants? Who knows! At the end of the day, all that really matters is that [PAWN_label] is capable of feeding or fertilizing an entire colony on [PAWN_possessive] own.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Industrial efficiency
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] is about twice as efficient at gaining nourishment and producing materials from prey as other predators. [PAWN_pronoun] uses the whole muffalo.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Efficient
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] is about 150% as efficient at gaining nourishment and producing materials from prey as other predators. [PAWN_possessive] body just knows how to coax a little more nutrition out of the marrows and ligaments of [PAWN_possessive] prey.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Normal efficiency
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] is as efficient as other predators.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Inefficient
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] is about 75% as efficient at gaining nourishment and producing materials from prey as other predators. [PAWN_possessive] body just isn't as good at breaking down all those tough, unchewed tissues into something nutritious.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Very inefficient
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] is about half as efficient at gaining nourishment and producing materials from prey as other predators. [PAWN_pronoun] needs to eat a lot of people to stay full.

RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Nutritiousness
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks determine how nutritious the pawn is to predators. The more nutritious, the more vore products will be produced.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Very nutritious
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] is about twice as nutritious as other prey. The best kind of ration around!

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Nutritious
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] is about 150% as nutritious as other prey. [PAWN_pronoun]'ll keep a pred full for a while.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Normal nutritiousness
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] is as nutritious as other prey.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Unnutritious
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] is about 75% as nutritious as other prey. [PAWN_pronoun] wouldn't make for good livestock.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Junk prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] is about half as nutritious as other prey. You'd get a better meal out of a vending machine.
